title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Multi-Cloud Chaos: The Unified Cloud Mesh Architecture (ARC332)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越多云混乱：统一云网格架构 (ARC332)
abstract: Deploying applications across multiple regions, clouds, and Kubernetes clusters creates fragmented, insecure infrastructure. This complicates governance by forcing separate policies for north-south and east-west traffic. This session introduces the “Universal Mesh,” a unified connectivity layer that simplifies governance and observability across hybrid environments. This strategy delivers comprehensive control over all traffic patterns, from edge ingress through the mesh to backend services. Secure applications with consistent WAF and API protection at the perimeter while ensuring zero-trust internally. Discover how to centrally orchestrate policies and transform your multi-cloud deployments into a single, secure, cohesive platform. This presentation is brought to you by HAProxy Technologies, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 跨多个区域、云和 Kubernetes 集群部署应用程序会创建分散且不安全的基础设施。这通过强制对南北向和东西向流量采用单独的策略来使治理变得复杂。本会议介绍了"通用网格"，这是一个统一的连接层，可简化混合环境中的治理和可观测性。该策略对从边缘入口通过网格到后端服务的所有流量模式提供全面控制。在边界使用一致的 WAF 和 API 保护来保护应用程序，同时确保内部零信任。了解如何集中编排策略并将您的多云部署转换为单一、安全、统一的平台。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 HAProxy Technologies 提供。
